name: Bunny - The Horror Game
description: There is a terrible bunny in the house.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
